headline: Pool Heat Pump Market Research Report 2025-2030, Profiles of Key Vendors - Rheem, AquaCal, Systemair, Pentair, Aldes, Hayward, Fluidra, Daikin, Fairland Group, PHNIX
summary: Key factors driving this growth include regulatory advancements in energy-efficiency standards, rising gas prices, and increased consumer preference for environmentally friendly heating solutions. Europe’s energy policies and the US Department of Energy’s tightening standards are boosting demand for high-efficiency pool heat pumps. Technological innovations such as smart and IoT-enabled systems are enhancing connectivity and energy transparency. Leading players in the market include Rheem, AquaC
